channel.title: [GLITCH] BM_C2A4C - Refuse destroyers impassable
channel.description:
map : bm_c2a4c at: -1215 x, 1628 y, 591 z setpos -1215.816528 1628.884399 591.531250;setang 10.246721 -83.172729 0.000000
If you don't move over the conveyor fast enough, the 'refuse destroyers' get out of order, and eventually wind up at a point where the section is impassable without reload. It appears the second two are moving out of order to the first one. ![2012-09-16_00001.jpg|690x500](upload://zYyglgA2hhaiImgepvkRtL0Ya4B.jpeg)

item.title: [GLITCH] BM_C2A4C - Refuse destroyers impassable
item.dc:creator: Savion
item.description:
I agree it could use some tweaking. You can pass all 3 if you speed run up against the first one as it going down. Continue running forward as it holds you back.

Read full topic

item.title: [GLITCH] BM_C2A4C - Refuse destroyers impassable
item.dc:creator: Georges
item.description:
Please see here to continue the discussion on this bug.

Read full topic

item.title: [GLITCH] BM_C2A4C - Refuse destroyers impassable
item.dc:creator: DarkCamo
item.description:
I made a video showcasing this problem. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Byc5SoZZEyk . You can either use cheats and noclip past it. Or load back to the autosave at the beginning of the level. Not a save that you made, the autosave. Pull the lever and quickly run through it. The longer you wait, the more harder it gets to pass, because the kill triggers go out of sync, it can also be related to the quicksave because I did the same exact thing. The best way to get past this is to sprint.

Read full topic

item.title: [GLITCH] BM_C2A4C - Refuse destroyers impassable
item.dc:creator: beaverulf
item.description:
I still can’t get passed it. What do you suggest? Ive tried reloading a couple of times.

Read full topic

item.title: [GLITCH] BM_C2A4C - Refuse destroyers impassable
item.dc:creator: Dr_Tub
item.description:
I noticed this is as well. After getting crushed about 20 times I magically made it through and was promptly crushed at the second set (after setting a quick save ofc).

It really scared me after awhile… I though it might be completely impassable.

Read full topic

If you don’t move over the conveyor fast enough, the ‘refuse destroyers’ get out of order, and eventually wind up at a point where the section is impassable without reload. It appears the second two are moving out of order to the first one.

on this exact spot. was starting to think i was crazy.
